entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Ronge Airport 2:27 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 90 %

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain over southern sections. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
